DOC.brief_summary: Health-related Quality of life in Danish stage IB-III cutaneous melanoma patients.
DOC.brief_title: Quality of Life and Surgical Late Effects of Melanoma Treatment
DOC.detailed_description: The aim of the PhD-study is to evaluate, in a large cohort of Danish melanoma patients: 1. Health-related quality of life assessing psychological, physical and social well-being 2. Physical long term side effects (lymphoedema, scarring and neuropathic pain) 3. Lymphoedema assessed by clinical examination and DXA scans
DOC.criteria: AJCC stage IBIII cutaneous melanoma patients At least one year followup after melanoma surgery Pregnancy Bilateral axilla or groin melanoma surgery
